pkgmetadata.longdescription: A KangarooTwelve library that utilizes the XKCP package and can be optionally optimized during compile-time based on a target. It produces implementation classes that work on top of Digest::Base and conform with how Digest classes work.

use.flag: Build 'armv6' target (0.4.0 and newer versions only)
